title: Font suggestions pls!
content:
Hi all!

This is my first post here :)

I’m looking for a font like this  
any suggestions from all you typography experts?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141907/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_56.jpg) | 21.33 KB |

 [‹ Font ID - Grant Thornton](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141907/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46998 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) “Swiss etc.” newspaper text face - Esperanto {Fabienne (self)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141907/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16826 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Krissu

comments.content:
Hi Krissu,

welcome to Typophile!

Have a look at [Schoolhouse fonts (Cursive)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141907/http:/www.schoolhousefonts.com/Schoolhouse/products.htm) or [Monotype School Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141907/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/school-script/).

A less scholastic, more lively option: [Handsome](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141907/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=handsome&site=d&sample_text=fanny) by [Nick Shinn](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141907/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Nick%252BShinn).  
F
